title: Peer-to-peer lending agreements (LendingClub, Prosper)
dataVerified: Borrower, lender, loan amount, terms, platform, payment schedule
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Loan status (active/paid/defaulted). Link to P2P platform system (parties and regulators, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake lending agreements. Domain binding verifies P2P platform. Tamper-evident loan terms. Prevents borrower fraud (multiple loans with same documents). Regulatory compliance (SEC, state lending laws).
